title: Tell me a story (Canberra) : Digital Storytelling project
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Memory
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Life change events
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Life change events
abstract: Eleven stories, created as part of ACMI's 'Train the trainer' program in Canberra.
description: This compilation of eleven stories, created by Canberra locals, was the culmination of ACMI's 'Train the trainer' workshops. The stories, mostly biographical, cover a wide range of topics but are mostly concerned with beloved family members and life changing events.
